original_text: But all the time we want to please the Lord. We want to do that while we are still at home in our body here on earth. We also want to please him when we go away from these bodies.
korean_text: 그런즉 우리는 몸으로 있든지 떠나든지 주를 기쁘시게 하는 자가 되기를 힘쓰노라

sentences.original_text: we want to please the Lord
while we are still at home in our body
We also want to please him
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 또한 그분을 기쁘시게 하고 싶어합니다

sentences.original_text: when we go away from these bodies
